item.title: CBS data for Economic Evaluations in R
item.description: true # Function to calculate the friction period with CBS data library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union FrictionPeriods <- function(years, industry = "T001081", folderpath = NULL, download = T, yeardays = 365.25, ...) { # Required libraroes require("dplyr") require("cbsodataR") require("lubridate") # Check path input parameter if (download & is.
